Comment: Given that in the same week he had  attacked the magazine over the Hegseth thing, I'm shocked he  gave interview with them. Apparently they cold-called him, and he could not resist  >Apparently, as word of our meeting spread through Trump‚Äôs inner circle, someone had reminded him of some of the things we (specifically Ashley) had said and written that he didn‚Äôt like. We still don‚Äôt know who it was‚Äîbut we immediately understood the consequences: no photo shoot, no tour of the newly redecorated Oval Office or the Lincoln Bedroom, and definitely no interview.But we‚Äôve both covered Trump long enough to know that his first word is rarely his final one. So at 10:45 on a Saturday morning in late March, we called him on his cellphone. (Don‚Äôt ask how we got his number. All we can say is that the White House staff have imperfect control over Trump‚Äôs personal communication devices.) The president was at the country club he owns in Bedminster, New Jersey.
